title: Apple's 2026 roadmap may include home hub, cameras and refreshed HomePod mini
text: Apple is reportedly planning a major smart home push in 2026, including a refreshed HomePod mini, a new home hub with Face ID and Apple Intelligence, plus possible security and doorbell cameras, signalling a broader expansion of its connected home ecosystem.

title: Three New Apple Home Products Rumored for 2026
text: Apple has a long list of new products rumored for 2026, including a series of home products that will see the company establishing more of a presence in the smart home space. Robots are on the horizon for 2027, but the 2026 releases will be a little tamer. HomePod mini We're expecting a new HomePod mini 2 to launch at any time. Apple isn't going to update the device's design, but we could get new colors.

title: Apple Releases HomePod Software 26.3
text: Alongside iOS 26.3, iPadOS 26.3, and macOS Tahoe 26.3, Apple has released new HomePod 26.3 software for the HomePod and the HomePod mini. The update comes two months after Apple released HomePod Software 26.2. According to Apple's release notes, HomePod Software 26.3 includes performance and stability improvements. According to Apple's release notes, HomePod Software 26.3 includes performance and stability improvements.

title: Apple Expected to Launch These 10+ Products Over the Coming Months
text: It has been a slow start to 2026 for Apple product launches, with only a new AirTag and a special Apple Watch band released so far. We are still waiting for MacBook Pro models with M5 Pro and M5 Max chips, the iPhone 17e, a lower-cost MacBook with an iPhone chip, long-rumored updates to the Apple TV and HomePod mini, and much more.
